transcript.title: PM 70/1962 - ROYAL VISIT 1963
transcript.content:
62/ 1 1
73/ 1962
ROYAL VISIT 1963
The Australian Secroery to the Queen Sir Roy
Dowling, will visit Perth, Darwin, Alice Springs and
Adelaide during an eight-day tour beginning on Mcnday.
During the tour, Sir Roy Dowling will have
detailed discussions with Royal Visi t directors in Western
Australia ( Mr, R. Doig), in the Northern Territory ( Mr, R,
Nott) and in South Australia ( Mr. L. King),
Sir Roy Dowling will also tour and inspect the
places which it is proposed the Queen sh~ ould visit in the
two States and the Northern Territory.
He is scheduled to arrive in Perth at 6.15 P. m
on Monday in Darwin at 7 p~ m. on Wednesday, in Alice
Springs a 5 p. mb on Friday and in Adelaide'at 2 p~ m. on
Sunday ( October 14).
The tour will complete the series of visits being
made by Sir Roy Dcwling to all State capitals,
CANBERRA, October, 1962,,
